pages.text: All forms of life possess an internal energy, from the tiniest seed to the mighty Dragon at the End of Time. A witch often focuses on manipulating this energy for their own desires, be they good or ill… However, this energy can only freely be harnessed from plants and fungi, but not from living creatures.

This energy, ME for short, works best with a diverse garden, a vibrant rainbow of colours, rather than an overly-saturated puddle of the same thing. In layman’s terms, a witch should use a varied mix of different flora for their Altars, rather than using many of the same plant.
